name: League of Ancients: Early Access Client
name_original: League of Ancients: Early Access Client
description:
Play the League of Ancients: Early Access Client, made in Unity. Sorry, friend list editing is disabled at the moment. You can still send messages to your current friends, though. Note: early access means a growing playerbase, which means your queue time may take long.

CW: language, slur, rape mention

One-week prototype for Prototype Studio (week 11). Prompt: boredom

Music:

"Killers" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
